title: Celery in production: Three more years of fixing bugs
description: This post covers the various issues we faced with celery in production over the last year or so. An ex-team member had iterated on a bunch of celery issues around 3 years before this iteration and had blogged about his experience here: https://medium.com/squad-engineering/two-years-with-celery-in-production-bug-fix-edition-22238669601d While that iteration
